sentences.sContent: Merchant says: "These coloring liquids have money to also cannot be bought, one car goods just gives manufacturer we one pyxis ."
sentences.sContent_eng: Merchant says: "These coloring liquids have money to also cannot be bought, one car goods just gives manufacturer we one pyxis ."
sentences.sCn: 店主说：“这些染色液体有钱也买不到，厂家一车货才给我们一小瓶。”
